original: intros l1 l2 i Hsorted Hcontig. induction l1. - simpl in *. auto. - simpl in *. destruct Hcontig as [Hc1 Hc2]. apply cons_contiguous_sorted with (a := a) in Hcontig as Hcontig'; try auto. assert (Ha := Hcontig'). destruct (sorted_cons_elim Hsorted) as [Hsorted' _]. apply IHl1 in Hcontig'; try auto. auto.
